name: T039 Foam Proportioner Civil ITP
Details
1 - Issued For Construction Drawings
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings Issued by Client/Engineer
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Issued For Construction Drawings Available
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - H
HOLD POINT
2 - Survey & Setout
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings, CTS General Civil Construction Spec, CTS Excavation Works Spec
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Foundations and embedded items shall be setout following the tolerances, heights and positions shown in each foundations respective drawing.
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P
3 - Waste Management & Disposal
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CTS General Civil Construction Spec, CTS Excavation Works Spec, CTS Contaminated Environmental Ground Soil Managenet Plan RW-231
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Waste management plan prepared and followed. Supporting documents available on request.
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - R
4 - Trim Subgrade
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Underground Services Drawings, CTS Excavation Permit, CTS Excavation Works Spec, CTS General Civil Construction Specification
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Subgrade to be trimmed within -250mm of the Finished Site Concrete level and to the levels stated on the drawings
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - H
HOLD POINT
5 - Backfill/Subgrade Compaction
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings, CTS General Civil Construction Specification, Clegg Compaction Inspection Record

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Foundation subbase shall consist of 200mm of Gap65 Blue-Brown Rock hardfill material. Subbase compaction shall be tested using a clegg hammer, all readings to exceed a CIV of 24 with 90% of tests to exceed 30.
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - H
HOLD POINT
6 - Site Concrete
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings, CTS General Civil Construction Specification, Inspection Records, Delivery Dockets
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Site concrete to be placed at the thicknesses shown on the drawings and finished to a height of +/- 10mm
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - R
7 - Reinforcing
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings, CTS General Civil Construction Specification NZS3109, Manufacturers Documentation, Inspection Records

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - All reinforcing bars shall be Micro-Alloy Class E to AS/NZS 4671 as shown in IFC's. All reinforcing bar hooks, laps and bends shall be in accordance with NZS3109 unless otherwise noted. All reinforcing shall be tied and laid out to comply with the IFC drawings.
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - H
HOLD POINT
8 - Cast in Items - Nuts, Bolts and Studs
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings, CTS General Civil Construction Specification, CTS Epoxy Grouting of Anchor Bolts, Manufacturers Documentation, Inspection Records

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Epoxy Grout Shall be Ramset C8 placed in accordance with manufacturers recommendations to the levels and positions setout in the drawings. Drilled holes for Anchors shall be inspected by Civil Inspector.
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - H
HOLD POINT
9 - Formwork
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings, CTS General Civil Construction Specification NZS3109, Inspection Records

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Fillets to corners above ground as noted on IFC drawings. Tolerances for Insitu formwork shall be +/-20mm dimensionally, and +/-12mm level. Minimum cover shall be 50mm unless cast against the ground which shall be 75mm unless noted otherwise.
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - W
HOLD POINT
10 - Grouting
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings, CTS General Civil Construction Specification, Manufacturers Specification, Inspection Records
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Grouting shall be Sika 212 or Sika 214 placed in accordance with manufacturers recommendations and the IFC drawings
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - W
HOLD POINT
11 - Concrete
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings ,CTS General Civil Construction Specification NZS3112/NZS3109, Inspection Records, Delivery Dockets
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Concrete shall be 30MPa 28 day compressive strength, Slump Tests - one for every pour, Crush Tests taken per pour as per NZS3109 & CTS General Civil Specification
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - H
HOLD POINT
12 - Complete final Civil Inspection and close off ITP
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - IFC Drawings, CTS General Civil Construction Specification, Manufacturers Specification
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - ITP/QC has been completed; all steps & hold points signed byrelevant party. All work completed as per work pack, and any field instructions issued during construction compiled.
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - R
13 - Non-Conformance Reporting
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - UCC Internal NCR and or Lucidity event NCR, QC Requirements for Civil Works
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - All Non-Conformance reports and Investigations are attached and closed out
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - H
HOLD POINT
14 - As Built & Final Design Documentation
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Confirmation From Engineer on as built records & redline mark ups
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P
15 - Reference Info, Specifications
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Provided a completed construction defect report that that details any remedial measures taken, & snag lists closed out
16 - Punch Listing
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - CTS QC Requirments for Civil Work
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - All punch list items are closed out in the relevant timeframe to the required standard
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - P, CTS Civil Inspector - R
17 - Compilation of ITP
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - ITP Completed and Signed off
DATE/SIGN - Contractor Rep - H, CTS Civil Inspector - H
HOLD POINT
